dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 consists of 50,000 training and 10,000 validation color images of 32x32 resolution with 10 classes. It is a balanced dataset where each class holds the same number of images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 consists of 50,000 training and 10,000 validation color images of 32x32 resolution with 100 classes. It is a balanced dataset where each class holds the same number of images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet dataset contains 1.28 million training images and 50,000 validation images with 1,000 classes. The dataset is used for large-scale image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: Y. Cui
M. Jia
T.-Y. Lin
Y. Song
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: Long-Tailed CIFAR is a dataset designed to address class imbalance issues, where the number of samples in the largest class is significantly greater than in the smallest class.
dcterms:title: Long-Tailed CIFAR
